This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0061 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published

name: CheckDigitScheme
title: checkDigitScheme
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the check digit scheme employed.   Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in PPN, XCN and XON segments.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0061 (Check Digit Scheme)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.valueString: A non-embossed number included on bank cards and used to validate authenticity of the card and the person presenting the card
